title: Bug 7752 - Export multiple files with same file name under different directories to zip file fails.
description:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Launch WSWB and create two projects
2. Under each project, create a new file with the same name (such as 'foo.txt')
3. From the main menu, select File -> Export and select Zip File to export.
OB: When exporting the projects to a zip file, if there are multiple files with the same name but under different directories, the export fails. The files are not included in the resulting zip file.
EB: When exporting the projects to a zip file, files with the same name should be able to be stored under different directories. All the files should be included in the resulting zip file without any issues or data loss.
SR:
1. Launch WSWB and create two projects.
2. Under each project, create a new file with the same name (such as 'foo.txt').
3. From the main menu, select File -> Export and select Zip File to export.
4. Verify that all files with the same name are included in the resulting zip file, regardless of the directories they are located in.
